name: Last Beer
description:
Bob has just received the last infinite beer in the world and want to keep it for himself, he must now run with it to flee from people. Beware of Client, Runner, Server and the Cruel Betty Who is really angry and doesn't want to let this Beer go away

Programmer : CapitaineDoigt (https://www.twitch.tv/capitainedoigt)

Music/Sound Design : CapitaineDoigt

Graphics/Game Picture : Forticher (https://www.twitch.tv/forticher)
